title: Roster swaps: OPL teams gear up for Split 1

replies.body:
OCE is getting the same NA/EU treatment, of recruiting from Korea. We really are making progress as a scene.

Shaping up to be a good year

I don't agree that recruiting unknown rookie players from Korea shows proof of progress. I think teams need to improve infrastructure in terms of management and coaching rather than wasting money importing unknown talent.
Swiffer's on break at the moment, which is why Chiefs brought in Cheese.

Who is going to WIN??
Cheifs - Hellions

Really nice to see some new players join in the scene obviously there will be people not liking the Korean recruitments. But personally I believe this will improve OCE as a region and get us noticed, best of luck to the new OPL teams and players!
i actually expect hellions and sin to take a couple of games from the chiefs

I'm very excited about seeing these teams show us their best - it lifts the whole region's game.
(Eeee! k1ng meets Legacy!)
Lol we have teams? since when

oh my god seriously who cares, its so baaad when you realise that PEOPLE ARE ACTUALLY GETTING PAYED MONEY TO PLAY GAMES, what has this world become, they should actually invest their time into something productive.

They're investing time into something they love to do, much like normal athletes. Athletes are paid money to play games, too- basketball, racing, football, soccer and other sports are basically games. Sounds productive enough to me, mate.
I'm just hoping we get another shot at the Wildcard tournament. Go the Chiefs!! :D
